column1: Little Goat Diner////Little Goat gets better the more I visit.  The menu is very extensive
column2: so you're sure to find something you're in the mood for.  You can never go wrong with all day breakfast
column3: but I recently was introduced to the Chickpea Salad. Wow!  I'm not usually a salad guy
column4: but trust me on this!  I had it once with griddled chicken
column6: and it was great both times.  The desserts are awesome
